Title: Establishes the internet media freedom task force
Summary: Establishes the internet media freedom task force to study the practices and policies of social media companies that allow the posting of third-party content by users, as well as other issues relating to dissemination of such content, including but not limited to, forms of censorship employed by social media companies.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish the internet media freedom task force; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
